justification: The article states that the SRDT "requires participants to decide whether two words are semantically related or not" and is one of the "tasks to behaviorally measure people's representations of semantic relatedness."

measured_by: cosine similarity from fastText word2vec embeddings
justification: Parameter values for semantic relatedness were "derived by calculating the cosine similarity values of a representative word-pair data set … using the fastText word2vec model," indicating this computational cosine metric was used as the measure of semantic relatedness.
